name: The Rise of Cheems: The BONK Within
name_original: The Rise of Cheems: The BONK Within
description: The Rise of Cheems: The BONK Within is the first of a series of games I will be making. You want to eliminate the other lesser epic cheems with a baseball bat that you pick up by holding "click" in it. Try to drag the baseball bat and hit the other cheems. All cheems take two hits with the baseball bat to die. I put a lot of effort into the music so I am also including the two tracks I have in the game. I hope you enjoy and if you have any feedback, please leave it in the comments as I am always open to suggestions!
